data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Neil Harris (Cardiff) is making a first change, with Harry Wilson replacing the possibly injured Gregory Cunningham.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Sheyi Ojo scores to make it 0-1 at Deepdale.
In the minute 52, Kieffer Moore instrumental with a fine assist.
Preston's Alan Browne has been booked in Preston.
Alex Neil (Preston) is making a first substitution, with Tom Barkhuizen replacing Brad Potts.
In the minute 68, The home team have replaced Sean Maguire with Emil Riis Jakobsen. This is the second substitution made today by Alex Neil.
Jayden Stockley is replacing Ryan Ledson for Preston at Deepdale.
Neil Harris (Cardiff) has taken off Jordi Osei-Tutu who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Souleymane Bamba is the replacement.
In the minute 79, Neil Harris is making the team's third substitution at Deepdale with Will Vaulks replacing Sheyi Ojo.
